sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import "../../styles/modernTechResume.css"; const TemplateOne = ({ data }) => { return (
{/* Left Sidebar */}

{data.name}

{data.role}

LinkedIn GitHub

Contact

  • Email: {data.contact.email}
  • Phone: {data.contact.phone}

Skills

    {data.skills.map((skill, index) => (
  • {skill}
    • ))}
{/* Right Main Content */}

{data.summary}

Experience

{data.experience.map((exp, index) => (

{exp.role} - {exp.company}

{exp.duration}

{exp.description}

))}

Education

{data.education.map((edu, index) => (

{edu.degree}

{edu.institution} ({edu.duration})
))}
); }; export default TemplateOne;
